introduction: https://vimeo.com/226281669This is the animation which spelled a thought and posture through movements and images of dancing.“Existence” and “Words” of somebody whom I came across in the past, are piling up at the bottom ofthe personal thought with sentiment. And it becomes the energy to live for, and is rebuilt again.I think that it resembles a process of the act itself to make art-work.Although we worry about many things around us, the posture that I say “It’s all right to live with them”…I made its image full of vitality so that it can be felt positively with your eyes and heart.
